item.title: Every Outbound Link Leaks Privacy
item.description: The title is a bit of an exaggeration, but it’s partly true if you don’t use the correct properties in your HTML elements. In HTML, you should be using rel="noopener noreferrer" along with target="_blank" in your <a> tags - if not, you run major security risks. This GitHub Pages site shows you how: https://apal21.github.io/target-blank/ Many linters will catch this if it’s not set, so make sure that you’re using a linter when you write your code.
